00042 //
00043 // An abstract class which provides support for execution.
00044 //
00045 class XALAN_PLATFORMSUPPORT_EXPORT ExecutionContext
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049     explicit
00050     ExecutionContext( MemoryManagerType& m_memoryManager);
00051 
00052     virtual
00053     ~ExecutionContext();
00054 
00062     virtual void
00063     error(
00064             const XalanDOMString&   msg,
00065             const XalanNode*        sourceNode = 0,
00066             const LocatorType*      locator = 0) const = 0;
00067 
00075     virtual void
00076     warn(
00077             const XalanDOMString&   msg,
00078             const XalanNode*        sourceNode = 0,
00079             const LocatorType*      locator = 0) const = 0;
00080 
00088     virtual void
00089     message(
00090             const XalanDOMString&   msg,
00091             const XalanNode*        sourceNode = 0,
00092             const LocatorType*      locator = 0) const = 0;
00093 
00094     MemoryManagerType&
00095     getMemoryManager()
00096     {
00097         return m_memoryManager;
00098     }
00099 protected:
00100     MemoryManagerType&              m_memoryManager;
00101 };
